will seed it wiff ya

One of the best animated films i know.  Beautyful and dark with revolutionary animation. Bluth took a handfull of animators and left Disney, inventing new ways to animate perspective and glowing effects, investing many years and his life savings and did this masterpiece! Truly a classic! Thank you!

Sorry gang, it's the US pan and scan version, no Swedish subs. :(

Piratrofan: Swesub finns på www.undertexter.se
http://www.undertexter.se/?p=subark&id=4164
i deras forum har de guider hur man lägger sub på dvdr.

Kan hända att du får ändra frameraten eller så.
Eller så kan du göra som jag brukar göra.
Rippa den engelska subtitlen ifrån dvdn i rätt framerate, och öppna den svenska subtitlen ifrån www.undertexter.se och kopiera in det svenska över det engelska med programmet "Subtitle Workshop" det blir ca 1000st copy & paste men går rätt fort.

One of the best animated films most defenetely! I have it, but in full screen as well. One of the most dark movies, and not Disney! So no non-sense music, treated for kids. This is a real, serious animation

"The Secret of NIMH was animated in the 1.33:1 aspect ratio, and matted in theatres to 1.85:1 widescreen." From the review at the following: http://www.ultimatedisney.com/secretofnimh.html

That said, there is a NTSC version with both the widescreen and fullscreen version along with English, Spanish, and French audio, but I haven't been able to find it as a torrent.
